description: The Slim and Clear Ring Series Phone CasesDesigned by CoverON and Compatible for: Motorola Moto G Power 2021

Made of a premium hard polycarbonate back plate fused together with semi-flexible TPU rubber bumpers, the Dynamic Series is made for your daily routine. Slim fit and lightweight, the case can slide in and out of even the skinniest of jeans. Clear back with a tinted finish allows the natural look of the phone to peak through, matched with contrasting and colorful bumpers. To take the Dynamic Series to the next level, we embedded a full-metal ring in the back of the case. With 360 degrees of rotation, you can be sure to find the perfect grip. Plus, inside the ring is a sturdy metal disc that connects to all magnetic car mounts and holders. On top of that, the ring doubles as a hands-free kickstand for easy movie and video watching. The perfect daily-use phone case.

Please note: be sure to peel off clear protective film from the metal disc (where the magnet icon + "MagneticAbsorption" is). The disc may looked "scratched" upon delivery, but after peeling off the protective film it will appear shiny and scratch-free as intended.
